channel.title: Hiding port and IP?
channel.description:
We want to be able to hide our server's port an IP, so that random clients cant connect and ask why an item is null for them etc. and we dont want random connections.
I found this code
[code]Hidden(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value) [/code]
But I have no clue how to use it or where to put it :|

item.title: Hiding port and IP?
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

well make it so they cant change the ip then delete all your java files so they cant edit anything and there are tutorials to make only your client connect to yoour server

Read full topic

item.title: Hiding port and IP?
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

Take out server Server IP and Port strings, prevent enter key access and mouse clicking access, if you are not sure how to do this i remember seeing a few tutorials in the rsps client hacking section.

Read full topic
